name: Muc's Adventure
description:
A simple 2D platform game about the journey to defeat the bad guys of the little black cat named Muc!

This is my first game ever! Hope you guys enjoy it :D .

Control:

  • Left, right arrow: Move left and right
  • Space : Jump
  • X : Attack

Creadit:

Background Music: using INFINITY CRYSTAL: AWAKENING by Sara Garrard
